definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: name (v. BH [[שֵׁם]]);—cstr. ´[[שׁ]]: Ezr 5:1 +; sf. [[שְׁמֵהּ]] Da 2:20 +; pl. cstr. [[שְׁמָהָת]] Ezr 5:4, sf. [[תְהׂם]]- v:Ezr 5:10;—name, dei: Da 2:20, Da 4:5, Ezr 5:1, Ezr 6:12; vir.: Da 2:26, Da 4:15, Da 4:16, Da 5:12 (all Dan.), Ezr 5:4, Ezr 5:10, Ezr 5:10 also v:Ezr 5:14, with which cf. S-C:K 4, 5, s f., 12 f.
